reviews.review: you can level up quickly when you are playing as killer or survivor. it remind me of F13 the games. also i watch e3 trailer the evil dead the games. look fwd the new improvement. plus the l4d (bill) RS, halloween, etc. fun to play. try to escape, or be a killer. you have to unlock the level to get better improvement skill to win the games. as first would be challenge but FUN!!!!!
I only play this game because my friends play it. The servers are ass. The queues are ass. This game is cheeks.
very good and addicting try it for yourself i guarantee you will going to enjoy it

Muito bom para jogar com amigos.
Adaptive and immersive! Innovates with the time!

SO MUCH FUN! Me and my best friend literally spend every morning and every evening playing this game. It's complicated enough to be a challenge, and also has enough content to keep you going forever. Sometimes it is hard to win (because you are playing against another player, or your survivor team sucks) but I even enjoy those games.

don't refund the game unless you literally don't enjoy it because its fun but you can expect yourself to do good i have the amount of hours it says i do and even then i'm still learning new killers the survivors idk know i thought they all did the same thing but the killer role is the fun part especially being a survivor with the generators even now generators still get me
10/10 for horror fans, good fun time with da boyz!
confusing at first but fun after you learn the mechanics
only 4 killers are S tier. everyone else is iffy if u win. but im rating this game 10/10 because they said DEAD BY DAYLIGHT in the resident evil type voice. fucking amazing.
Good game, wish there was more maps and techniques into escaping/dodging the killer when being chased.
Not scary but a very fun PvP game. Even better when you kill or survive with your friends!
I mean after almost 4,000 hours I can safely recommend this game to others. Pretty Good Job So FAR

Quiza divertido si tienes toda la mierda comprada o te odias a ti mismo, pero jugarlo desde 0 es horrible, colas de 5 minutos como killer para ir contra premades que solo rushean colas de 3 minutos como survivor para facecamperos y equipos de mierda, casi todo el contenido de pago y si no quieres sacar mas dinero de lo que vale el juego te toca farmear como cerdo, quiza al inicio fue divertido pero su estado actual es lamentable a menos que te odies o tengas amigos para reirte un rato.
Always Japan, I'm not allowed to play the game.
i think dead by daylight is a very fun game i reccomend

I know its says i only played 102 minutes of this game but trust me its not counting the time i played on ps4 i most likely 1000 plus hours on it this game can either be really fun or not fun if the killer is try harding or camping it can ruin it but its kind of part of the game i count camping as being in a very close to the hooked person i dont care if you stay in eye sight but if your next to it thats camping

Good game, high replayability, and a decent learning curve with many techniques you adapt the more you play, whether you learned them by flailing around trying to evade the killer or practiced after watching every tips and tricks youtube video on this game under the sun.

Overall its a great game but PLEASE IT NEEDS SOME BALANCING IN THE MATCHMAKING SYSTEM , like i just bought this game yesterday and already met a high skilled hunter that literally a hunter , they hunt us down ITS VERY SCARY AND FUNN butt still its not fair bcs im a low skilled player <3 , maybe its me who needs some balancing ... back to the point it's a great gamee
One of the best multiplayer games I've ever played
Great Game. Killer are unique and each perk plays the game differently. Surviors op.
I still thinking, that buying this game was a mistake
i have use offering to go map racoon city but not work.lol
I would have recommended this game before this update but the zombies ruined it and made it stupid and not fun to play thanks devs for ruining the game
The serotonin diminishes the more I play killer.
I wish they would just add party chat to the game instead of everyone having to do loopholes and talk through discord it gets annoying
they are going to remodel nea :)
if you want suicidal thoughts every single second of playing this game, then this is the game for you ;)
Jogo divertido pra jogar com amigos. Casual.
great fun with all the killers and survivers
Its a really good game with a bunch of variety, the communitys toxic tho :(
i have played this game for a couple days and i love it.

Dead by daylight has it's ups and downs and your enjoyment of it will depend heavily on what the latest expansion is. If the killer is pretty well tuned then you should have a great time but if they're busted you won't get a chance to really feel what dead by daylight is. Don't give up on it because you had a few bad matches and grab some friends if you're playing survivor (Communication makes it sooooo much easier). I take frequent hiatuses from this game but it's something I do enjoy coming back to again and again.
